name: Bio Trio
description:
Laz Man is a freakingly lazy guy who chain smokes and indulges himself in all kinds of sugary foods. He lives his life without any exercise at all.

Soon enough bacteria and their evil family grow from some part of the Laz Man and will try to gain control of his whole body (da da da daaaa). A good NANOBOT is sent to seek and destroy the EVIL bacteria and their evil family. Will the NANOBOT succeed…. ?

Game devloped during the Games Now! Game Jam 2019 at Aalto University.
